en: Symbols to the left in a cell are voiceless. to the right are voiced. Shaded areas denote articulations judged impossible.
zh: 成對出現的音標，左邊為清輔音，右邊為濁輔音。陰影區域表示不可能產生的音。

en: Affricates and double articulations can be represented by two symbols joined by a tie bar if necessary.
zh: 若有必要，塞擦音及雙重調音可以用連音符連接兩個符號。

en: Some diacritics may be placed above a symbol with a descender.
zh: 如果是下伸符號，附加符號可以珈在上方。
